pkgmetadata.longdescription: =====horoscope=====A Python module to fetch and parse data from Ganeshaspeaks.Installation============Install using pip: pip install horoscopeUsage===== from horoscope import Horoscope your_horoscope = Horoscope.get_todays_horoscope ('Libra') #do stuff with the parsed data your_horoscope['date'] your_horoscope['sunsign'] your_horoscope['horscope']Features========Currently implemented---------------------* Today's Horscope* Weekly Horoscope * Monthly Horoscope* Yearly HoroscopeTodo----* Personality Profile * Facts About a Sunsign* Practical Side of a Sunsign* Astrological Perspective of a Sunsign* More information about a sunsign
